backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing products, inventory, sales, rules, user profiles, and cash transactions with access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing one frontend feature with linked files, components, test IDs, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend source files detailing their responsibilities and recent enhancements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes using OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and script loading the Vite React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling navigation, wrapping pages with QueryClientProvider, and rendering footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/AdjustStockModal: Modal for adding or reducing inventory stock with validation, error normalization, and backend mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard showing sales summary, payment totals, low‑stock detection, and authentication‑aware error handling.
frontend/src/components/EditInventoryIte: Modal for editing an existing inventory item with validation, duplicate name checks, and update mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/EditSaleModal.ts: Modal to edit a sale record, allowing item quantity/price updates, item removal, and submission via updateSale mutation.
frontend/src/components/InventoryFormMod: Form modal for creating new inventory items with validation, duplicate checks, stock calculations, and addInventory mutation.
frontend/src/components/InventoryPage.ts: Main inventory page showing item list, loading/error states, and controls for adding, editing, and adjusting stock.
frontend/src/components/InventoryReportP: Page displaying inventory adjustment history with error handling and simple date formatting.
frontend/src/components/LowStockWarningD: Dialog that lists inventory items below minimum stock thresholds with basic item details.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Navigation bar component with logo, main menu items, and a dropdown submenu for reports, triggering view changes.
frontend/src/components/ProductFormModal: Modal form for adding new products, handling image uploads, validation, and authenticated submission.
frontend/src/components/ProductsPage.tsx: Page showing product list with loading and error states, plus controls to add products and navigate back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/QuantityPromptMo: Modal asking for product quantity, calculating subtotal, and confirming the selection.
Reusable error display component showing normalized error details and a retry button.
Sales report page with date filtering, table generation, export to XLS, and sale editing/deletion flows.
frontend/src/components/SignInRequiredSt: UI state prompting users to sign in with Internet Identity, showing login progress.
frontend/src/components/StockDeductionRu: Empty placeholder file for a stock deduction rules modal.
Implements a two-step cart and payment UI for recording sales, managing cart items, quantities, and submitting the sale via backend hooks.
frontend/src/constants/productOptions.ts: Defines constant arrays and types for product categories and sizes used across product-related features.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's role with safe fallbacks and warnings, intended only for informational backend compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardSummary.t: Queries the backend for dashboard summary data using an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvalidateActorQue: Exposes a function to invalidate all actor-related queries for refreshing backend interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: Provides hooks to list, add, update, and adjust inventory items via backend actor with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventoryReport.ts: Fetches inventory report entries using a public actor with optional filtering parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches product list and supports adding products, invalidating product queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicActor.ts: Creates and manages a public anonymous actor and refreshes dependent queries when it updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecordSale.ts: Provides a mutation to record a sale and invalidates dashboard and inventory queries after success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesMutations.ts: Contains mutations to update or delete sales, refreshing sales reports and dashboard data on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalesReport.ts: Fetches sales records within a timestamp range using an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStockDeductionRule: File is empty or truncated; no functionality is present.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/errorMessage.ts: Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages with auth and network detection.
frontend/src/utils/exportToXls.ts: Generates an Excel-compatible HTML table for sales report data and triggers file download.
frontend/src/utils/inventoryName.ts: Provides utilities for normalizing inventory item names and detecting duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/salesFormat.ts: Formats currency, dates, and payment method labels for sales-related UI.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radius, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, issues, and architectural notes for the Inventory Report system.
